sample_scores.source: After experiencing a mind-blowing sensual orgy, Mike's was sure he had taken an overdose.

sample_scores.source: Like an old fire horse.

sample_scores.source: Although she had flowers and applause, maybe said she was not.

metrics_description.bleurt: BLEURT score (基于BERT的评估指标, 分数范围不固定, 越高越好)
